explains: adj. 切实可行的；可经营的；能工作的

sentences.en: Investors can simply pay cash, but this isn't a workable solution in most cases.
sentences.cn: 投资者可以仅付现金，但这在多数情况下不是一种切实可行的解决办法。

sentences.en: It offers people workable steps to reach an agreement with the help of a mediator.
sentences.cn: 它为人们在调解人的帮助下达成协议提供了可行的步骤。

sentences.en: Though the Swedish model appears workable for most American parents, it may not be accepted by them in its entirety.
sentences.cn: 虽然瑞典模式对大多数美国父母来说是可行的，但它可能不会被他们全部接受。
